Package it.polimi.se2019.model.actions

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.actions.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Attack, Grab, Move, Reload
    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent the actions that the Player can do; in order, the player can: Move - Grab - Reload - Shoot
